page.title: 06PUBLIC & LOCAL SERVICES
page.content:
There are no public bus services which pass through this block. Chidren who attend primary school are taken to/from Aldbrough St. John daily by taxi whilst any secondary school aged children are picked up by a private bus which also serves other villages between here and Richmond. Most households now have a car and as the nearest shop and post office is at least one mile away, at Eppleby or Aldbrough, a car is almost a necessity for members of this isolated area.
There is no village hall, public house or any social group within this community. A public mains water supply came to Stanwick and Carlton only within the past 10 years or so and there is still no mains sewage system, a septic tank serves each separate dwelling.
